content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis, two new Genesis themes, a handy Genesis hook reference from Carrie Dils, and a rockstar from the Genesis community is the latest name to be added to the forthcoming Profitable WordPress Developer event.

Themes

(Another!) new theme from Seo Themes, Store Pro. As the name suggests it’s a WooCommerce compatible Genesis theme, with all the polish you’d expect based on their previous offerings.

Introducing Store Pro – A WooCommerce Genesis child theme https://t.co/vMvQvr9sFw #genesiswp #woocommerce #WordPress pic.twitter.com/wHCqCCdBbF

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) May 22, 2017

ZigZagPress launch their 36th theme, Brighter, a ‘minimalist theme for loners and creative types’.

Announcing our 36th #genesiswp theme: Brighter, a fiercely minimalist theme with folio, for agencies and creatives. https://t.co/rhMhGusoY7

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) May 26, 2017

Matt Whiteley with a preview of his next theme, FreelancePro.

First peek at the next #genesiswp theme on the way. FreelancePro! pic.twitter.com/q90eG4UlZG

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) May 25, 2017

Showcase

Dom Wint with a new site for cloverdesign.co.uk

New #WordPress #genesiswp site launched. Graphic designer portfolio built on customised Sample theme – https://t.co/6ZnPpKVayk pic.twitter.com/i2O4RgxMYf

— Dom Wint (@CleanPageDesign) May 26, 2017

Majorie Ray with a new launch for catdailmusic.com

Excited to launch musician Cat Dail's new website https://t.co/MNeUUM8C41 #catdailmusic #genesiswp #codewryter #Studiopress #WordPress #fun

— Marjorie Ray (@Marjorie_Ray) May 27, 2017

Best of the rest

Genesis Hook Reference! A handy list of all the hooks in Genesis. Kudos to Carrie Dils for putting this together.

Genesis Hook Reference: A Complete List of Hooks https://t.co/ckroKvLFEP

— Jackie D'Elia (@jdelia) May 27, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to exclude Posts having a specific tag from Genesis Featured Posts…

How to exclude Posts having a specific tag from Genesis Featured Posts:https://t.co/xMS8p4pMSV#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 22, 2017

…and how to add an inline mobile responsive menu in Genesis Sample.

Updated inline mobile responsive menu tutorial for the current latest Genesis Sample.https://t.co/gC8fmtSGra#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/VsMtudCge3

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 23, 2017

Jesse Petersen updates his premium After Entry Widget Pro plugin, with some new features.

UPDATED: GenesisThe.me After Entry Widget Pro now has global hide/show options, plus pages. https://t.co/5kmMk3OjDY #genesiswp

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) May 25, 2017

Peter Shilling with an update to his media manager plugin for Genesis.

#GenesisWP Developer? We have updated our media manager plugin for Genesis, great for your #youtube or #soundcloud https://t.co/v94AOtQNlR

— Peter Shilling (@PShilling) May 24, 2017

Tonya Mork reveals that Genesis’ own Gary Jones will be joining her at the Profitable Developer Bootcamp in Milwaukee in October joining an already stellar line-up.

ICYMI @GaryJ is coming to Milwaukee to be one of your mentors! Wow, the expert line-up is amazing! https://t.co/o4dxeaUbhp #GenesisWP https://t.co/kvqSPmGjq5

— Know The Code (@KnowTheCodePro) May 22, 2017

Bob WP with a quick round-up of why he continues to use (and recommend) Genesis.

Here are several reasons I have been using #genesiswp themes for as long as I have. https://t.co/62Z2VukJ6W

— BobWP (@bobWP) May 25, 2017

excerpt.rendered: Two new Genesis themes, a handy Genesis hook reference from Carrie Dils, and a rockstar from the Genesis community is the latest name to be added to the forthcoming Profitable WordPress Developer event
